Bullet knew the way the system worked, the new bot was always at fault. "No=
 sir, I was out of line and deserve whatever punishment you choose." He was=
 making himself an easy target but he knew that there was one defense that =
always worked with Preds. "I just hope to one day be among your troops usin=
g my abilities the way they were meant to." he grinned at the thought "To d=
estroy the enemy."

Perceptor::

"What strange..." said Perceptor "Chamaleo=
n is pretty nice and calmed 
down... he could be a bit hysterical but not a=
 mean-bot... Do you 
have anything else to say, Bullet? "
